Trade/Device Name(s): Bionexia hCG Pregnancy Cassette and Dipstick Tests
ADT's Bionexia hCG Pregnancy Cassette and Dipstick Tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Applied DNA Technologies Bionexia hCG Pregnancy Cassette and Dipstick Tests for qualitative detection of hCG in urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for visual, qualitative detection of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) in urine at 20 mIU/mL and above to aid in early determination of pregnancy for use by healthcare professionals.
